## MessageAggregator.toString() method

Returns all messages as a single string joined using the optionally-supplied `separator`<!-- -->, or newline if no separator is specified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toString(separator?: string): string;
```

Description

<tbody><tr><td>

separator


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The optional separator used to join strings.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string
